Articles.Content:
Since the original MLP Megathread died out or was removed, i had to learn some internet sorcery to revive the thread.

But first, we have some rules so it won't get deleted.

-Keep it SFW.

-All NSFW images/links have to be kept in a spoiler.

-Also, about spoilers about new episodes.. Keep it to yourself.

Remember bronies and pegasisters of this forum, love and tolerate!
Closing this in regards to ruling on fan threads by Ted.
